address: Xã An Phước, Huyện Long Thành, Tỉnh Đồng Nai
thought:
**Determining the Updated Administrative Unit for "Xã An Phước, Huyện Long Thành, Tỉnh Đồng Nai"**

Okay, so I've been asked to find the new administrative unit for "Xã An Phước, Huyện Long Thành, Tỉnh Đồng Nai".  My first step is to break this down. I need to focus on "Tỉnh Đồng Nai" (Dong Nai Province) and "Xã An Phước" (An Phuoc Ward).

My process starts with a province-level check.  I need to determine if Dong Nai Province has undergone any recent mergers or name changes.  Quickly scanning through the "Province resolutions," I see that a previous proposal to merge with Binh Phuoc Province was reverted. So, Dong Nai remains as Dong Nai.

Now, I'll dive into other relevant resolutions, specifically looking for any involving Dong Nai Province and An Phuoc Ward. I zeroed in on "1662/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Đồng Nai" (Resolution 1662/NQ-UBTVQH15: Rearranging the administrative units of Dong Nai Province at the commune level).

Bingo! Line 8 of this resolution is crucial. It directly states the merger of "Xã Tam An" and "Xã An Phước" to form a *new* "Xã An Phước."  While the name remains the same, it's now a combined unit. This is the key piece of information.

Finally, just to double-check, I look at the "New wards" list for a confirmation. There it is: `{"ward_code":"26383","ward_name":"Xã An Phước","province_name":"Tỉnh Đồng Nai"}`.  Perfect match!

My conclusion is clear: "Xã An Phước" in "Tỉnh Đồng Nai" has been involved in a recent administrative rearrangement. Specifically, it has merged with "Xã Tam An," but maintains its original name. This is directly stated in resolution 1662/NQ-UBTVQH15, line 8. My confidence in this is very high because the resolution is very specific and I have direct confirmation.

citation.header: 1662/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Đồng Nai
citation.line: 8. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của xã Tam An và xã An Phước thành xã mới có tên gọi là **xã An Phước**.
